scripts.lint: pnpm run frontend:lint && pnpm run backend:lint
scripts.format: cargo fmt --all && cd frontend && pnpm run format
scripts.check: pnpm run frontend:check && pnpm run backend:check
scripts.dev: export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && export VK_ALLOWED_ORIGINS="http://localhost:${FRONTEND_PORT}" && export VITE_VK_SHARED_API_BASE=${VK_SHARED_API_BASE:-} && concurrently "pnpm run backend:dev:watch" "pnpm run frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:dev: BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) pnpm run backend:dev:watch
scripts.backend:dev:watch: DISABLE_WORKTREE_CLEANUP=1 RUST_LOG=debug cargo watch -w crates -x 'run --bin server'
